Where Can I Get Miruken-ES5?Â¶

It may be obvious by the name, but Miruken-ES5 packages do not use any or the new ES2015 syntax and do not need to be transpiled.

## Bower

bower install miruken-es5

Brings in just the miruken library.

bower install miruken-es5-angular

Brings in the miruken library and the angular integration.

## NPM We do plan to publish miruken-es5 packages to npm but have not done so yet. If you need these for your project please ask and we will move it up in priority.

## Nuget We do plan to publish miruken-es5 packages to Nuget but have not done so yet. If you need these for your project please ask and we will move it up in priority.
